etymology.description: 𠆢 is a variant form of 人(人) (rén, 'person') -> side view of a standing man
etymology.interpretation: The character 𠆢 is a variant form of 人(人) (rén, 'person'), which is a pictogram depicting the side view of a person, highlighting an arm and a leg. It visually conveys the concept of a person standing upright. This character is less commonly used compared to its main form 人(人).
